Hello,

We are pleased to announce that the annual CIPS MENA Procurement & Supply Chain Conference and Awards will be held on Monday 5 May 2025 at the Mandarin Oriental, Al Faisaliah in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. 

Building on the success of last year's event, which saw over 1,500 attendees and a record number of nominations, we aim to make this year's conference and awards our most successful yet.

Why Attend?

*	Networking Opportunities - Connect with high-profile decision-makers from both private and government sectors.
*	Award Entries - Showcase your achievements and gain recognition in the procurement and supply chain profession.

Please mark your calendar <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FwdtDClMq4T1BZlGCqsYSzGXBq%3Fdomain%3Dapp.cipscomms.org&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccc68da25995144a13e1708dd315f07be%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638721006402294787%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wgtPMNkG4gQH%2FHj4Jq%2BQguVw%2FXgZ0rPAwX5Bovj6Kpk%3D&reserved=0>  for the biggest and most influential event in the profession across the MENA region.
